glsa.title: Namazu: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Namazu, worst of which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Namazu is a full-text search engine intended for easy use.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Namazu. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a cookie.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Namazu users should upgrade to the latest version:
